item.title: 优步预计第二季度业绩乐观，乘车和快递需求稳定
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周三预测，第二季度调整后的核心利润和总预订量基本高于华尔街预期，这表明其打车和送餐服务的需求具有弹性。【原文：Uber Technologies forecast second-quarter adjusted core profit and gross bookings largely above Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, indicating resilient demand for its ride-hailing and food delivery services.】

item.title: 美国乐园和流媒体推动迪士尼盈利超出预期
item.description: 华特迪士尼的季度业绩超出了华尔街的预期，原因是今年前三个月美国主题公园的游客增加了消费，而且该公司的 Disney+ 流媒体用户也意外增加。【原文：Walt Disney's quarterly results topped Wall Street expectations as visitors to its U.S. theme parks increased spending in the first three months of the year and the company saw an unexpected rise in Disney+ streaming customers.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，沃尔沃汽车公司因后视摄像头问题召回逾 40 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）表示，瑞典汽车制造商沃尔沃汽车公司因后视摄像头问题在美国召回413151辆汽车。【原文：Swedish automaker Volvo Cars is recalling 413,151 vehicles in the United States over an issue with the rearview camera, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said.】

item.title: 预计电费将上涨，Equinix 马来西亚分公司关注替代能源选择
item.description: 数据中心公司 Equinix 的马来西亚分部周三表示，由于预计国内电价即将上调将增加其成本，该公司正在考察各种替代能源供应商。【原文：The Malaysian unit of data centre firm Equinix said on Wednesday it is looking at various providers of alternative energy as it expects an impending increase in domestic electricity tariffs to raise its costs.】

item.title: 加工利润率高企，邦吉第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: 邦吉公司（Bunge）周三公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是谷物贸易商和加工商受益于较高的加工利润率和关税不确定性推动的产品需求。【原文：Bunge beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter profit on Wednesday as the grain trader and processor benefited from higher processing margins and tariff uncertainty-fueled demand for its products.】

item.title: 欧盟起诉多个国家未妥善执行《数字服务法
item.description: 欧盟委员会在一份声明中说，它已决定将捷克共和国、西班牙、塞浦路斯、波兰和葡萄牙告上欧盟法院，因为它们未能有效执行《数字服务法》（DSA）。【原文：The European Commission said in a statement it had decided to take the Czech Republic, Spain, Cyprus, Poland and Portugal to the Court of Justice of the European Union for failing to implement the Digital Services Act (DSA) effectively.】

item.title: 美股期货因中国贸易降级希望而上涨；美联储受到关注
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货反弹，因为与中国政府的贸易紧张局势有望缓和，而美联储正在举行的货币政策会议仍是焦点。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rebounded on Wednesday as hopes of a de-escalation in trade tensions with Beijing firmed, while the Federal Reserve's ongoing monetary policy meeting remained in focus.】

item.title: 早间竞标贸易谈判终于开始
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 消息人士称，Grab 希望在第二季度达成收购印度尼西亚 GoTo 公司的交易
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，在美国上市的打车和送餐公司Grab正寻求在第二季度达成收购印尼较小竞争对手GoTo的交易。【原文：U.S.-listed ride-hailing and food delivery firm Grab is looking to strike a deal to take over smaller Indonesian rival GoTo in the second quarter, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国旅游需求下滑对低成本航空公司打击最大
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战导致旅游需求下滑，这让美国所有航空公司都陷入困境，但廉价航空公司的痛苦最为严重。【原文：A slump in travel demand due to President Donald Trump's trade war has left all U.S. airlines reeling, but the pain is most acute at budget carriers.】

item.title: 美股在关税反弹后面临估值上升、盈利前景不明等问题
item.description: 美国股市在经历了关税引发的暴跌之后，投资者对阻碍市场在短期内取得更显著涨幅的障碍保持警惕。【原文：After a round-trip for U.S. stocks following their tariff-fueled swoon, investors are wary of obstacles that will prevent the market from more significant gains in the near term.】

item.title: 贸易政策混乱，投资者期待软数据指引方向
item.description: 由于具体的官方指标在瞬息万变的环境中很快就会过时，美国贸易政策的摇摆不定正迫使一些投资者更多地依赖传闻数据来帮助他们做出决策。【原文：Whipsawing U.S. trade policies are forcing some investors to lean more on anecdotal data to help them make decisions, as concrete official indicators become out-of-date too quickly in the rapidly changing environment.】

item.title: 美联储可能维持利率不变，以寻求经济的清晰度
item.description: 美联储官员表示，在决定下一步利率行动之前，他们希望对美国经济的走向有一个更清晰的认识，但由于贸易和其他政策仍未确定，央行上次会议以来的数据使得前景可以说更加扑朔迷离。【原文：Federal Reserve officials say they want a clearer picture of the U.S. economy's direction before deciding their next interest rate move, but data since the central bank's last meeting have made the outlook arguably even more confusing as trade and other policies remain unsettled.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：欧盟考虑对波音飞机征收关税
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，欧盟打算对波音飞机征收关税。【原文：The European Union intends to propose tariffs on Boeing jets, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德首席财务官怀疑特朗普关于药品生产的行政命令能否缩短时限
item.description: 肥胖症药物制造商诺和诺德公司的首席财务官周三表示，他对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于缩短该国制药厂审批时间的行政命令是否会显著改变制药行业的时间表持怀疑态度。【原文：Obesity drugmaker Novo Nordisk's CFO said on Wednesday he was sceptical that U.S. President Donald Trump's executive order to reduce the time it takes to approve pharmaceutical plants in the country will significantly change timelines for the pharma industry.】

item.title: 制药商诺和诺德在美国放弃性别比例要求
item.description: 肥胖症药品生产商诺和诺德公司周三表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发布行政命令停止多元化、公平和包容性举措后，该公司将放弃对其美国业务的性别比例要求。【原文：Obesity drugmaker Novo Nordisk said on Wednesday it would drop gender representation requirements for its U.S. business following executive orders by President Donald Trump to stop diversity, equity and inclusion initiatives.】

item.title: 特斯拉中国制造电动汽车 4 月销量同比下降 6
item.description: 中国乘用车联席会周三公布的数据显示，特斯拉 4 月份在中国销售了 58459 辆电动汽车，同比下降 6%。【原文：Tesla sold 58,459 China-made electric vehicles in April, down 6% from last year, data from the China Passenger Car Association showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在港上市的吉利汽车考虑私有化中国业务 ZEEKR
item.description: 在香港上市的吉利汽车控股公司周三表示，该公司正寻求对旗下中国汽车制造商部门蔚来汽车进行私有化，拟以每股蔚来汽车股票 2.566 美元或每股美国存托股票 25.66 美元的价格对该部门进行估值。【原文：Hong Kong-listed Geely Automobile Holdings said on Wednesday it is looking to privatise its Chinese automaker unit ZEEKR , proposing to value the unit at US$2.566 per ZEEKR share or $25.66 per American Depository Share.】

item.title: 由于关税影响，沃尔沃汽车将在南卡罗来纳州工厂裁员 5
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周三表示，由于市场环境的变化和包括关税在内的贸易政策的演变，该公司将对位于美国查尔斯顿（Charleston）的工厂进行生产调整，并裁员5%。【原文：Volvo Cars said on Wednesday it would make production changes and cut 5% of the workforce at its Charleston plant in the United States due to changing market conditions and evolving trade policies, including tariffs.】

item.title: 中国电子商务竞争加剧，阿里巴巴与红记笔合作
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴正与流行内容平台红笔记合作，允许红笔记上的用户直接点击产品链接到阿里巴巴的淘宝平台购物。【原文：Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba is partnering with popular content platform RedNote to allow users on RedNote to directly click on product links to shop on Alibaba's Taobao platform.】

item.title: 德国金融监管机构：银行表现强劲，但不确定性较高
item.description: 德国银行监管机构 BaFin 总裁马克-布兰森（Mark Branson）周三表示，德国的金融企业处于强势地位，但不确定性仍然极高。【原文：Mark Branson, the president of Germany's bank watchdog BaFin, said on Wednesday that the nation's financial firms were in a strong position but that uncertainty would remain extremely high.】

item.title: 打击贸易欺诈，越南从中国运往美国的货物创历史新高
item.description: 4 月份，越南从中国的进口额和对美国的出口额均创下了疫情过后的最高纪录，而此时越南正与华盛顿就减少河内的贸易顺差进行谈判，并打击经由越南领土运往美国的中国商品。【原文：Vietnam's imports from China and exports to the United States both reached a post-pandemic record in April, amid talks with Washington to reduce Hanoi's trade surplus and a crackdown on Chinese goods being shipped to the U.S. via its territory.】

item.title: 潘多拉坚持在美国发展，首席执行官称需求依然强劲
item.description: 珠宝制造商潘多拉（Pandora）首席执行官亚历山大-拉奇克（Alexander Lacik）周三告诉路透社记者，尽管美国关税可能会削弱消费者需求，但潘多拉一直在扩大在美国的市场份额，并计划继续投资以赢得新客户。【原文：Jewellery maker Pandora has been gaining market share in the United States and plans to keep investing to win over new customers there, CEO Alexander Lacik told Reuters on Wednesday, despite the risk U.S. tariffs will dent consumer demand.】

item.title: 主要央行的宽松政策在 4 月放缓至涓涓细流
item.description: 4 月份，由于贸易紧张局势升级，决策者面临经济增长和通胀前景的不确定性，主要央行的降息潮放缓至涓涓细流。【原文：The rush to cut interest rates at major central banks slowed to a trickle in April, as policymakers faced uncertainty on the outlook for economic growth and inflation in the wake of escalating trade tensions.】

item.title: 韩国央行会议纪要显示即将再次降息
item.description: 周三，韩国央行上个月的会议纪要显示，大多数韩国央行董事会成员都认为，韩国经济面临的不利因素增长速度快于预期，因此有必要进一步降息。【原文：Most of the Bank of Korea's board members assessed headwinds to South Korea's economy were growing faster than expected, a factor that would warrant more interest rate cuts, minutes from last month's meeting showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: Zalando 利用人工智能加速营销活动，降低成本
item.description: 欧洲在线时尚零售商 Zalando 周三表示，随着人工智能对时尚产业的冲击和成本的削减，该公司正在使用生成式人工智能为其应用程序和网站更快地生成图像。【原文：European online fashion retailer Zalando is using generative artificial intelligence to produce imagery faster for its app and website, it said on Wednesday, as AI shakes up the fashion industry and cuts costs.】

item.title: 移动运营商警告称，如果没有更多频谱，欧洲可能在 6G 方面落后于美国
item.description: 欧洲最大的 12 家电信公司周三敦促监管机构为移动服务分配更多频谱，并警告欧洲在未来 6G 部署方面有可能落后于美国。【原文：Twelve of the largest European telecoms firms urged regulators on Wednesday to allocate more spectrum for mobile services, warning Europe risks falling behind the U.S. in future 6G deployment.】

item.title: 沃达丰财务总监卢卡-穆契奇将于 2026 年初卸任
item.description: 移动通信集团沃达丰（Vodafone）周三表示，财务总监卢卡-穆契奇（Luka Mucic）将于明年年初卸任，并补充说，寻找继任者的工作正在进行中。【原文：Mobile group Vodafone said on Wednesday finance chief Luka Mucic will be stepping down from his role by early next year, adding that a search for his successor is ongoing.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度交易所 BSE 和 NSE 限制海外用户访问网站
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，印度最大的两家交易所--国家证券交易所（NSE）和印度交易所有限公司（BSE Ltd）已限制海外用户访问其网站。【原文：India's top two exchanges, National Stock Exchange (NSE) and BSE Ltd , have restricted access to their websites for overseas users, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 宝马确认 2025 年展望，预计部分汽车关税将从 7 月起下降
item.description: 德国高档汽车制造商宝马公司（BMW）周三确认了其2025年的发展前景，并表示预计对汽车进口征收的部分关税将从7月份开始下降，这是该公司对汽车行业前景较为乐观的看法之一。【原文：German premium carmaker BMW on Wednesday confirmed its 2025 outlook, saying it expected some of the tariffs that have been imposed on vehicle imports to decline from July in one of the more optimistic views on the industry's prospects.】
